name: munchkinland
description: Chrome extension for formatting ANSI escape codes.

scripts.build-opt: rollup -c rollup-options.conf.js && cp munchkinland/src/options.html munchkinland/dist/options.html && cp munchkinland/src/options.css munchkinland/dist/options.css
scripts.build: npm run build-cs && npm run build-bg && npm run build-opt
scripts.pkg: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build && zip -r munchkinland.zip munchkinland -x *src*

author: Joe Nudell <joenudell@gmail.com>
